code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec get_max_function_value(receiver :: [integer], k :: integer) :: integer
  def get_max_function_value(receiver, k) do
    max_value = Enum.with_index(receiver)
    |> Enum.reduce(%{sums: %{}, max: 0}, fn {r, idx}, acc ->
      {sum, acc_sums} = get_sum_cached(receiver, k, idx, acc.sums)
      new_max = max(acc.max, sum)
      %{sums: acc_sums, max: new_max}
    end)
    |> Map.get(:max)

    max_value
  end

  defp get_sum_cached(receiver, 0, idx, sums) do
    {idx, sums}
  end
  defp get_sum_cached(receiver, k, idx, sums) do
    case Map.fetch(sums, {k, idx}) do
      :error ->
        next_idx = Enum.at(receiver, idx)
        {sum_next, updated_sums} = get_sum_cached(receiver, k-1, next_idx, sums)
        new_sum = idx + sum_next
        {new_sum, Map.put(updated_sums, {k, idx}, new_sum)}
      {:ok, sum} ->
        {sum, sums}
    end
  end
end
